con:configuration.scriptText:
def hearders = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders
def actualHTTPResponse = hearders['#status#']
assert actualHTTPResponse[0]=='HTTP/1.1 201 Created'
assert messageExchange.getResponseContent()=='Created'

con:testStep.name: Property Transfer- to Refer Token in Other test
Property Transfer - To save booking Id for getting Booking details

con:configuration.scriptText:
def hearders = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders
def actualHTTPResponse = hearders['#status#']
assert actualHTTPResponse[0]=="HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found"
assert messageExchange.getResponseContent()=="Not Found"

def hearders = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders
def actualHTTPResponse = hearders['#status#']
assert actualHTTPResponse[0]=="HTTP/1.1 400 Bad Request"
assert messageExchange.getResponseContent()=="Bad Request"

def hearders = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders
def actualHTTPResponse = hearders['#status#']
assert actualHTTPResponse[0]=="HTTP/1.1 418 I'm a Teapot"
assert messageExchange.getResponseContent()=="I'm a teapot"

def hearders = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders
def actualHTTPResponse = hearders['#status#']
assert actualHTTPResponse[0]=="HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error"
assert messageExchange.getResponseContent()=="Internal Server Error"

def hearders = messageExchange.response.responseHeaders
def actualHTTPResponse = hearders['#status#']
assert actualHTTPResponse[0]=="HTTP/1.1 418 I'm a Teapot"
assert messageExchange.getResponseContent()=="I'm a teapot"
